entry.title: Homepage Chenjianfeng
entry.content:
Correspondence: Software College, Shandong University, No.1500, Shunhua Rd., Jinan City, Shandong Province, P.R.C
Zipcode: 250101
E-mail: ginfungchan AT gmail.com or cjfameritop AT gmail.com
URL: chenjianfeng.net

ABOUT ME

I am a senior student at the software college in Shandong University,China, majoring in software engineering. Now I am applying for the graduate program for further study in the area of computer science.

RESEARCH INTEREST

  • Computer Aided Geometric Design
  • Computer Graphics and Data Visualization
  • Pattern Recognition
  • Data Mining and Data Analysis

EDUCATION

  • Shandong Univsity, Jinan, Shandong 2010-2014(expected) B.Eng. in software engineering
  • Dongguan Middle School, Dongguan, Guangdong 2007-2010 High School Diploma

PROJECT LIST

  • Equiareal parameterizations of NURBS surfaces
  • General rational bilinear transformation of NURBS surfaces
  • Recommendation system based on SNS
  • InnoTraffic-Intelligent navigation system
  • Electronic trading system with Hadoop storage
  • Music information retrieval system via humming
  • An improved k-means clustering algorithm and its application
  • Research on the query and update efficiency of B-Tree structure
  • The compiler for PL0/1 Language
  • A smart camera with cloud stroage for android
  • Digital system experiment

PUBLICATIONS AND DISSERTIONS

  • Equiareal parameterizations of NURBS surfaces

    Sci- Graphic Models, under review, 2013 [pdf]
    The equiareality of freeform surfaces greatly affects the results of visualization and tessellation applications, especially when dealing with extruding and intruding shapes. To improve the equiareality of given freeform surfaces, we present an optimization algorithm using the Mobius transformations in the paper.

  • An Interest-based Social Networking Content Recommendation Method

    CSCD- Journal of Mathematics in Practice and Theory, accepted ,2013 [pdf-Chinese]
    Effective content recommendation provide users with convenient and accurate access to contents of their interest, which is a significant approach to develop social network. This paper represents an interest-based Recommendation method (IRM) relating to social network. It collects user interest in order to build a user-interest-content model then presents an interest-based content recommendation sequence algorithm and verifies it.

  • Optimizing conformity of NURBS surfaces using general bilinear transformations

    Writing now
    The conformity of NURBS surfaces greatly affects rendering and tessellation results. To improve the conformity of NURBS surfaces, an optimization algorithm using general bilinear transformations is presented in this paper. This paper was inspired by the first paper (Equiareal parameterizations of NURBS surfaces), and we use a more general bilinear transformations to reparameterize the surfaces, rather than merely use the limited Mobius transformations.

  • Intelligent Navigation System basing Data Mining and Real-time Traffic

    Paper won the first prize for the science creation competition, Shandong University, 2012
    Without taking the real-time traffic situation into consideration, the typical navigation system merely receive the system users’ requirement and return them a shortest path, which is obviously limited. In this paper, we represent a totally model to build a much more effective navigation system. This model begins with collect the real-time traffic situation from four-dimensional source, analyzes the traffic data by a cellular automata, and then generate an optimal path to the user. This paper is one of the interim results for the university innovation project.

CERTIFICATIONS

  • IBM DB2 Academic Certificate
  • IBM XML Certificate
  • IBM Webspheree Certificate
  • Software College training certer (SDU) Certificate

TRAVEL EXPERIENCE
